story:
Once upon a time, in the magical land of India, there lived a brave young boy named Arjun. Arjun was a kind and curious child who loved exploring the forests and rivers near his village.

One night, as Arjun lay in bed, he heard a soft rustling outside his window. Curious, he tiptoed to the window and saw a beautiful peacock dancing in the moonlight. The peacock had shimmering feathers that gleamed in the moonlight, and it seemed to be inviting Arjun to follow it.

Excited, Arjun quietly slipped out of his house and followed the peacock deeper into the forest. As they walked, they encountered all sorts of magical creatures - from talking monkeys to mischievous fairies. Along the way, Arjun learned valuable lessons about bravery, kindness, and the importance of helping others.

Finally, they reached a clearing in the forest where a spectacular sight awaited them. A magnificent palace made of twinkling stars stood before them, and the peacock transformed into a wise old sage.

The sage smiled at Arjun and said, "You have shown courage and kindness on this journey, my dear boy. Remember that true magic lies within you, and that you have the power to make a difference in the world."

With those words, Arjun felt a warm glow in his heart and knew that he was meant for great things. He bid farewell to the sage and returned home, where he fell asleep with a smile on his face, knowing that he was special and loved.

And so, every night, Arjun would fall asleep dreaming of new adventures and the endless possibilities that awaited him in the world.

The end. Goodnight, dear child. Sleep tight and dream of magical adventures.
